main event: An unidentified flying object was reported in Gashland, Missouri on 7 January 1950.
interesting points: The object was observed at an altitude of three to four thousand feet., The object was described as having a brilliant white color., The witness did not report any sound or exhaust trail from the object., The object was heading northwest at the time of observation., A complete report was expected to follow but the sketch and photographs were not available.
